name: Chasing The Horizon Demo
description:
A character-driven Strategy RPG with a heavy aesthetic focus, developed by Kanfa Studios. Inspired by genre classics such as Berwick Saga, Fire Emblem, and Front Mission. The project is currently being developed for both PC and Mac but is also anticipated to release on PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch. Development has been in progress since 2019 by our team of hardcore SRPG fans and we are confident in our ability to develop a high quality product given the necessary funding.

*As this is an alpha build, all artwork, sprites, music, sound effects, writing, etc, are subject to change in the final release.
